# RCSService.GroupChatEvent.started(_:)

**Case**

Group chat started.

## Declaration

```swift
case started(RCSService.GroupChatStartedEvent)
```

## Chat life cycle events

- **RCSService.GroupChatStartedEvent**: Event triggered when group chat is started.
- **RCSService.GroupChatEvent.ended(_:)**: Group chat ended.
- **RCSService.GroupChatEndedEvent**: Event triggered when a group chat is ended.
- **RCSService.GroupChatEvent.subjectUpdated(_:)**: Group chat’s subject was updated.
- **RCSService.GroupChatSubjectUpdatedEvent**: Event triggered when a group’s subject is updated.

items.description: Event triggered when group chat is started.
items.name: RCSService.GroupChatStartedEvent

items.description: Event triggered when a group chat is ended.
